act_info.full_title: Dissolution of Inactive Corporations Act, 2006, S.O. 2006, c. 19 , Sched. J
act_info.citation: Dissolution of Inactive Corporations Act, 2006, S.O. 2006, c. 19 , Sched. J

content.content: 1. (1) The following corporations are dissolved: 1. IDEA Information Technology Fund Inc., a corporation incorporated under the Business Corporations Act as corporation number 527287 on November 4, 1982. 2. IDEA Innovation Fund Inc., a corporation incorporated under the Business Corporations Act as corporation number 527292 on November 4, 1982. 3. IDEA Research Investment Fund Inc., a corporation incorporated under the Business Corporations Act as corporation number 542930 on March 11, 1983. 4. Ontario Investment Service Inc., a corporation incorporated under the Business Corporations Act as corporation number 1096710 on September 15, 1994. 5. Ontario VL Corporation Ltd., a corporation incorporated under the Business Corporations Act as corporation number 1240201 on May 30, 1997. 2006, c. 19, Sched. J, s. 1 (1). Certificate of incorporation (2) The certificate of incorporation of each of the corporations mentioned in subsection (1) is cancelled. 2006, c. 19, Sched. J, s. 1 (2). Assets and liabilities (3) All assets and liabilities that each of the corporations mentioned in subsection (1) had on the day immediately before this section comes into force are vested in and become the assets and liabilities of the Crown, without compensation. 2006, c. 19, Sched. J, s. 1 (3). 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2006, c. 19, Sched. J, s. 2. 3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 2006, c. 19, Sched. J, s. 3. ______________ Français
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The following corporations are dissolved:

1. IDEA Information Technology Fund Inc., a corporation incorporated under the Business Corporations Act as corporation number 527287 on November 4, 1982.

2. IDEA Innovation Fund Inc., a corporation incorporated under the Business Corporations Act as corporation number 527292 on November 4, 1982.

3. IDEA Research Investment Fund Inc., a corporation incorporated under the Business Corporations Act as corporation number 542930 on March 11, 1983.

4. Ontario Investment Service Inc., a corporation incorporated under the Business Corporations Act as corporation number 1096710 on September 15, 1994.

5. Ontario VL Corporation Ltd., a corporation incorporated under the Business Corporations Act as corporation number 1240201 on May 30, 1997. 2006, c. 19, Sched. J, s. 1 (1).

Certificate of incorporation

(2) The certificate of incorporation of each of the corporations mentioned in subsection (1) is cancelled. 2006, c. 19, Sched. J, s. 1 (2).

Assets and liabilities

(3) All assets and liabilities that each of the corporations mentioned in subsection (1) had on the day immediately before this section comes into force are vested in and become the assets and liabilities of the Crown, without compensation. 2006, c. 19, Sched. J, s. 1 (3).

2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2006, c. 19, Sched. J, s. 2.

3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 2006, c. 19, Sched. J, s. 3.

______________

Français
